Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class Trap

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Trap
public class Trap extends Object
Represents a trap in the game, which includes a rock that falls when a player is nearby. The trap also interacts with the player's lives and HUD when activated.

    • isRockFalling

      public boolean isRockFalling

  • Constructor Details

    • Trap

      public Trap(float x, float y, float width, float height, String rockTexturePath)
      Constructs a Trap object with the specified position, size, and rock texture path.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the trap's position
      y - The y-coordinate of the trap's position
      width - The width of the trap
      height - The height of the trap
      rockTexturePath - The file path to the texture for the rock

  • Method Details

    • isPlayerNearby

      public boolean isPlayerNearby(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition)
      Checks if the player is within the bounds of the trap.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - The position of the player
      Returns:
      True if the player is within the bounds of the trap, false otherwise

    • fallRock

      public void fallRock(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 playerPosition, HUD hud, Player player, float delta, Friends friends)
      Causes the rock to fall when the player is nearby, updating the rock's position and applying damage. The trap also checks cooldowns to prevent multiple activations in quick succession.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - The position of the player
      hud - The HUD object to update the player's lives
      player - The player object to trigger effects (e.g., red effect)
      delta - The time elapsed since the last frame
      friends - The Friends object to manage the player's friends (e.g., removing a friend if necessary)

    • render

      public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Renders the rock if it is falling or has been moved from its initial position.
      Parameters:
      batch - The SpriteBatch used to render the rock texture

    • saveTrapState

      public void saveTrapState()
      Saves the current state of the trap, including its position and rock falling status.

    • loadTrapState

      public void loadTrapState()
      Loads the saved state of the trap, including its position and rock falling status.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposes of the resources used by the trap, including the rock texture.
